@description.name: @description
@description.body: Cross browser abstractions to work with input elements.

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Map} Internal data structures with all supported input types

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates an DOM input/textarea/select element. Attributes may be given directly with this call. This is critical for some attributes e.g. name, type, ... in many clients. Note: select and textarea elements are created using the identically named type.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: type {String} Any valid type for HTML, select and textarea
@param.description: Any valid type for HTML, select and textarea

@param.name: @param
@param.body: attributes {Map} Map of attributes to apply

@param.name: @param
@param.body: win {Window} Window to create the element for
@param.description: Window to create the element for

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Applies the given value to the element.

Normally the value is given as a string/number value and applied
to the field content (textfield, textarea) or used to
detect whether the field is checked (checkbox, radiobutton).

Supports array values for selectboxes (multiple-selection)
and checkboxes or radiobuttons (for convenience).

Please note: To modify the value attribute of a checkbox or
radiobutton use {@link qx.bom.element.Attribute#set} instead.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Returns the currently configured value.

Works with simple input fields as well as with
select boxes or option elements.

Returns an array in cases of multi-selection in
select boxes but in all other cases a string.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|Array} The value of the given element
@return.description: The value of the given element

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Sets the text wrap behaviour of a text area element.
This property uses the attribute "wrap" respectively
the style property "whiteSpace"

@param.name: @param
@param.body: wrap {Boolean} Whether to turn text wrap on or off.
@param.description: Whether to turn text wrap on or off.
